7.28a

HEROES

ALCHEMIST
GREEVIL'S GREED
  • Greevil's Greed stack duration reduced from 40 to 36
ARC WARDEN
  • Base strength reduced from 25 to 23
TALENTS
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +250 Flux Cast Range to +200
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +150 Spark Wraith Damage to +125
AXE
COUNTER HELIX
  • Counter Helix shard attack speed increased from 20 to 25
BATRIDER
  • Base movement speed increased from 290 to 295
BOUNTY HUNTER
TRACK
  • Track shard vision reduced from 800 to 600
BROODMOTHER
SILKEN BOLA
  • Silken Bola shard now deals 75 dps
CLINKZ
DEATH PACT
  • Death Pact damage reduced from 4/9/14% to 4/8/12%
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from -10s Skeleton Walk Cooldown to -7
ENIGMA
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +10% Cooldown Reduction to +8%
INVOKER
ICE WALL
  • Ice Wall shard increases wall length by 320 distance
JUGGERNAUT
SWIFTSLASH
  • Swiftslash cooldown increased from 15 to 20
  • Swiftslash cast range reduced from 650 to 600
BLADE FURY
  • Blade Fury shard attack damage now deals 75% damage instead of 100%
KEEPER OF THE LIGHT
ILLUMINATE
  • Illuminate max damage increased from 200/300/400/500 to 225/325/425/525
CHAKRA MAGIC
  • Chakra Magic mana restore increased from 80/160/240/320 to 100/180/260/340
SOLAR BIND
  • Solar Bind cooldown rescaled from 22/20/18/16 to 23/20/17/14
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent increased from -6s Blinding Light Cooldown to -8
KUNKKA
TIDAL WAVE
  • Tidal Wave manacost reduced from 150 to 75
  • Tidal Wave cooldown reduced from 16 to 14
LEGION COMMANDER
DUEL
  • Duel shard Overwhelming Odds strike interval changed from 1.5 to 2
  • Duel shard Overwhelming Odds first strike now happens immediately
LESHRAC
NIHILISM
  • Nihilism scepter no longer causes you to take increased damage
LIFESTEALER
  • Base damage increased by 3
GHOUL FRENZY
  • Ghoul Frenzy slow increased from 6/12/18/24% to 10/15/20/25%
RAGE
  • Rage movement speed increased from 15% to 15/16/17/18%
OPEN WOUNDS
  • Open Wounds shard manacost reduced from 125 to 75
LION
MANA DRAIN
  • Mana Drain shard attack speed reduction increased from 90 to 120

  • Savage Roar shard duration increased from 4 to 5 seconds

  • Lucent Beam shard stun duration increased from 1.1 to 1.2 seconds

TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from 10% Cooldown Reduction to 8%

TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from -3.5s Arrow Cooldown to -3s

  • Shadow Tree Dance shard cooldown increased from 0.3 to 0.4

  • Wrath of Nature scepter duration from 3 seconds max to 3.4 (1.2 to 1.6 min)

  • Vendetta manacost increased from 140/200/260 to 160/220/280

  • Base damage reduced by 3

DISMEMBER
  • Dismember Shard now reduces cooldown by 7 always, instead of by half when used on allies

  • Sleeping Dart cooldown reduced from 20 to 15

  • Vengeance Aura damage increased from 8/16/24/32% to 11/18/25/32%

  • Nether Swap cooldown reduced from 60/45/30 to 50/40/30
VIPER

  • Poison Attack shard max stack increase from +2 to +3
VISAGE
SILENT AS THE GRAVE
  • Silent as the Grave scepter upgrade no longer provides flying vision
WRAITH KING

  • Mortal Strike damage reduced from 150/190/230/270 to 140/180/220/260
